Name: Gray Death
About the game: Gray Death is a linear horror themed puzzle platformer, reminiscent of classic games like Solomon's Key and Dangerous Dave. The 20+ levels are short but challenging. You can either shoot or avoid enemies. You'll need to search for supplies and ammunition. The game can be switched between 2D and 2.5D. It's also the first episode in a planned series. Story After weeks of searching for food and supplies, Gray returns back to the compound he helped build. Gray finds his friend Red dying from a gunshot wound and learns that a group mutinied and another fled.
Meta Title: Gray Death: Jun 20, 2021, Salt & Pixel LLC and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Gray Death? Check out the release date (Jun 20, 2021), developer insights from Salt & Pixel LLC, and a complete game summary.
